title: Google can now combine results from text and image searches
content:
Google has always offered filters and multiple terms for text searches — for example, “microsoft windows” might show results related to Microsoft, Windows, or both. However, there’s never been an easy way to do that with images, besides using Google’s reverse image search to figure out what something is, then starting a new text search

The post Google can now combine results from text and image searches appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google has always offered filters and multiple terms for text searches — for example, “microsoft windows” might show results related to Microsoft, Windows, or both. However, there’s never been an easy way to do that with images, besides using Google’s reverse image search to figure out what something is, then starting a new text search
